articles.description: A redacted version of the Mar-a-Lago search warrant affidavit has been unsealed by the Justice Department, as ordered by a federal judge. Jessica Schneider gives the details on CNN Inside Politics.

articles.title: CNN examines how local water departments are cracking down in California  - CNN Video

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The frustrating truth about who is excluded from college debt relief
articles.description: The question for a lot of people who didn't go to college, those who already paid off their loans or folks who make more than $125,000 (or more than $250,000 if they're married couples or heads of households) is this: What about me?
